Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Family
Status: New Series
Network: BET ( USA)
Airs: Tuesdays at 10:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: January 15, 2013

"SECOND GENERATION WAYANS" is a hilarious new scripted comedy based on the lives of the members of the next generation of the Wayans family. However, as it turns out, being a Wayans isn't all fun and games. Viewers see the good, the funny and the ugly as the young trio emerges from the long shadows of their uncles to carve out their own paths to stardom in Hollywood. Executive produced by Devon Shepard, Marlon Wayans and Rick Alvarez. Starring Craig Wayans, Damien Dante Wayans, and George O. Gore II.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33125)

The Wayans family (pron.: /ˈweɪ.ənz/)[1] are an African American family including many directors, screenwriters, comedians and actors. Their parents are Howell and Elvira Wayans. There are ten siblings in the first generation, with many children of their own. They are known as The First Family Of Entertainment
(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wayans)
thanks for sharing. we don’t get BET in africa, therefore cant watch it.
